name: Daemon Bride
overview: Daemon Bride is one of the lesser known titles by Examu, released only in arcades in Japan. Sporting a balanced roster with angelic and demonic themes, Daemon Bride is a game about a bunch of high schoolers that have contracts with demons or angels. It features staples such as a succubus with a pretty boy and alluring female with a magic snake, but also more oddball characters such as gang member with angry quid and dog with Satan as a bird.
